name: Minesweeper 3D (itch) (RandomlySomeone)
description:
It's just a windows Minesweeper game made in 3D. I've altered the gameplay a little bit to make it more challenging to play.

= CONTROLS. = you can use WASD to move, mouse to move your cam, Q&E keys to move up and down. the numbers on the header indicates the number of mines adjacent to the block you're standing in (i.e, the blocks that share the same faces of your block).

The thingie may not work well in browsers since Unity can't lock your cursor in a browser somehow (I will try to fix it some time).
